column4: My mysql server won't start because it can't bind to a port, but there's nothing on that port, and even if change it around, it still can't bind. Suggestions?
do you use the ubuntu package?
I wasn't the admin to install the server in the first place. I believe so, but how do I check?
if its your own you could ask #mysql (you can ask there anyway theres where the experts are)
